Title: 🔁🖼 ⚡️ 30 STRIKE UAVs KILLED ➖➖➖➖➖➖➖➖➖➖ At the beginning of Sept...
Description: Forwarded From Commander of the Military Forces Mikola Oleshchuk⚡️ 30 STRIKE UAVs KILLED➖➖➖➖➖➖➖➖➖➖On September 13, 2024, the enemy was attacked by 2 ballistic missiles -Iskander-M-/KN- 23 from Voronezk region and 38 - attack UAVs of the -Shahed type - from the regions of Primorsko-Akhtarsk, Kursk - Russian Federation.💥 As a result of the anti-aircraft battle by mobile fire groups of the Ukrainian Defense Forces, aviation, anti-aircraft missile units and the REB 30 hostile UAVs were shot down near Mykolayivska, Vinnytsia, Sumy , Kirovograd, Kherson, Chernigiv, Dnipropetrovsk and Cherkasy regions. For the fighting work!🇺🇦 Together - to victory!➖➖➖➖➖➖➖➖➖➖🦅 Military Forces Lieutenant General Mykola Oleshchuk
